gameDetails.name: Teotihuacan: Brettspiel Adventskalender 2018 Promo
gameDetails.description:
Brettspiel Adventskalender 2018 Promo.

Contents: 
2 Starting tiles for Teotihuacan: City of Gods.

Rules:
Before setting up a game of Teotihuacan: City of Gods, replace two random Starting tiles form the game with the two starting tiles from this mini-expansion.

In 2020, became available as part of the Teotihuacan: City of Gods – Promo Bundle
